issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Add functions in Gandiva
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6023](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6023). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
support following functions in Gandiva -
1. int32 castINT(int64) : cast int64 to int32
1. float4 castFLOAT4(float8) : cast float8 to float4
1. int64 truncate(int64, int32 scale) : if scale is negative, make last -scale digits zero
1. timestamp add(date, int32 days) : add days to date(in milliseconds) and return   timestamp
